explains: adv. 首先，第一；最基础地，最重要地
wordGroup: first and foremost 首先；首要的是

sentences.en: It is first and foremost a trade agreement.
sentences.cn: 它首先是一项贸易协定。

sentences.en: This question has been foremost in our minds recently.
sentences.cn: 近来我们的心目中一直认为这个问题最重要。

sentences.en: He does a little teaching, but first and foremost he's a writer.
sentences.cn: 他干一点教学，但首要的是写作。
